title: JST, Mark 16
content: when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away, (for it was very great,)
unto them, Be not affrighted; ye seek Jesus of Nazareth,
was crucified; he is risen; he is not here; behold the place where they laid him;
go your way, tell his disciples and Peter, that he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him as he said unto you.
And they, entering into the sepulcher, saw the place where they laid Jesus.
